pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["OpenWRT（曾用名 LEDE）是一款广泛应用于路由器的嵌入式操作系统。本站提供 OpenWRT 的包管理器 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"opkg"}]," 的 release 部分镜像。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"部分镜像站（例如 TUNA/BFSU）并不包含 snapshots 镜像，USTC 提供了对 snapshots 的反代，请在替换之前确认各镜像站的情况。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手工替换","children":"手工替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["登录到路由器，并编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/opkg/distfeeds.conf"}]," 文件，将其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"http://downloads.openwrt.org"}]," 替换为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"自动替换","children":"自动替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"执行如下命令自动替换"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -i 's_https\?://downloads.openwrt.org_{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}_' /etc/opkg/distfeeds.conf","codeLanguage":"sh"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：使用 HTTPS 可以有效避免国内运营商的缓存劫持，但需要另行安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"libustream-openssl ca-bundle ca-certificates"}]," 。"]}]]}]

meta.title: OpenWRT 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
